basisSet.dc:title: 6-311G(2df,2pd)
basisSet.dct:abstract: VTZ2P Valence Triple Zeta + Double Polarization
basisSet.dc:description:
6-311G(2df,2pd) Valence Triple Zeta + Polarization --------------------------------------------------- Elements Contraction Reference H: (5s,2p,1d) -> [3s,2p,1d] R. Krishnan, J.S. Binkley, R. Seeger He: (5s,2p,1d) -> [3s,2p,1d] and J.A. Pople, J.C.P. 72, 650 (1980). Li - Ne: (11s,5p,2d,1f) -> [4s,3p,2d,1f] K - Ca: (14s,11p,5d,1f)-> [8s,7p,3d,1f] J-P. Blaudeau, M. P. McGrath, L.A. Curtiss and L. Radom, J. Chem. Phys. 107, 5016 (1997).
This basis contains three sets of polarization functions on every atom. Note: This basis set uses 5-component d functions.
